ygData.subject: RE: Travel Tips - FP & Qeynos
ygData.msgSnippet: ... He was yellow to me at L28, and my group of four (L25-28) barely took him out (not that we had much choice - he latched onto us while we were trying to get
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 24 Aug 1999, Jesse wrote:
>
> Ohhh.. there's one named that swims around a lot. Prince Kermyt. He thrash
> your evil friend. But I don't think there's much you can do but swim fast
> and hope you don't see him. I've only see him once.

He was yellow to me at L28, and my group of four (L25-28)
barely took him out (not that we had much choice - he latched
onto us while we were trying to get to the Rathe Mountains).

And just to epitomize how Verant discourages anything but
camping, all he had for loot was a few silver and rawhide
armbands.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
